features: Look forward to shaving with this luxuriously smooth operator, our smoothing Maca Root & Aloe Softening Shaving Cream.
Enriched with Community Trade organic aloe vera from Mexico, this cream leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and nick free after a shave.
Enriched with Community Trade Organic aloe vera from Mexico.
body.description: Look forward to shaving with this luxuriously smooth operator, our smoothing Maca Root & Aloe Softening Shaving Cream. Enriched with Community Trade organic aloe vera from Mexico, this cream leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and nick free after a shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PRODUCT DISCOVERY FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
reviews.reviewText: Hubby has always hated shaving cuz his face turns beet red and blotchy no matter what he tries...until we found this! He actually shaves regularly now (yay!!!) And looks younger because of it. I'm so grateful to the makers... please don't discontinue it! We put it on Subscribe and Save.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Shaving Cream
reviews.reviewText: My husband has used the Body Shop Shaving Cream for years and loves it. It smells wonderful and is very emollient. He is so happy to be able to order it fromAmazon and have it delivered quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Shaving Cream
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this shaving cream for awhile now with a single blade straight razor and I absolutely love it. Offers a nice smooth shave that's nicely scented and hydrating. For the most part red bumps are a thing of the past. Also, if you have a beard, this is great to massage into it and let it sit for a few minutes. It does wonders for comfort and seems to aid in softness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great natural shaving cream
reviews.reviewText: Ditched the chemical laced typical shaving creams and bough this after reading a lot of reviews. Love the scent and does the job. Not a single issue. Seems like a small jar but lasted quite a while. Just bought my second jar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice product - used it several times
reviews.reviewText: I alternate my shaving products and happily have this one in my rotation. It does a good job protecting you from razor burns or irritation. I like to have a menthol feel to my shaving products. This does not have any menthol but really doesn't need it. It has a texture of Noxzema and a light scent to it. I recommended this to my family. I use a double edge safety razor and follow a lot of social media for products. This came up and I was interested in trying it and glad I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for years and it’s been great. It helps reduce redness and skin irritation better than other products I’ve tried. I highly recommend this for anyone who has sensitive skin from shaving

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it softens the unshaven whiskers
reviews.reviewText: I've used the product for about three years. It is similar to, but better than Noxema-style softeners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shave cream
reviews.reviewText: Great product. As good as the Art of Shaving soap, at half the price.Unfortunately, they stopped selling this product in New York State.

O melhor desse creme para barbear, além de facilitar o deslizar da lâmina e proteger a pele, é que ele não é uma pasta branca, fica meio translúcido e facilita na hora de fazer contornos da bochecha, para quem tem barba, por exemplo. Recomendo!

Viene de buen tamaño, el aroma es masculino, pero trata muy bien la piel, lo he usado para rapar mi cabeza por un tratamiento médico, me ayudado mucho para minimizar la irritación de la piel, lo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always been a wet shaver and have struggled with sensitive skin. This is brilliant for me, smells nice and lathers up for a perfect shave. Highly recommend.
Protezione e scorrevolezza ottima.Texture molto leggeraOttima profumazione secondo i miei gusti dove non ci deve essere una profumazione aggressiva.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bought this out of the curiosity and based on some suggestions from the web to give it a try. What i can say, this is really really good product. The scent is maybe not very profound but subtle and encompassing enough to have that special feeling. The lather is really nice both with soft brushes and more stiff ones. The package holds more content that the competition and there are more organic/ natural ingredients as well. Highly recommended.
